ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +2 Soul.

name: 初めての出逢いの坂 恵
flavor_text: 本当に初めて会ったのは一年前の入学式だけどね
ability: 【C】 All your other 「はじまりの日 倫也」 get +1000 Power.
【A】 BOND／「はじまりの日 倫也」 ［①］ (When this card is played onto Stage, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「はじまりの日 倫也」 from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: 運命の出逢い？ 恵
flavor_text: 私がなに？
ability: 【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE in battle, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is Level 2 or higher, you may return this card to your Hand. (Climax is considered Level 0. Return revealed card to its original position)
【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is 0 or lower, you may REVERSE that Character.

name: 投げやりなまでの気安さ 恵
flavor_text: でも安芸くんだし、どうせ徹夜でゲームやるだけだよね？
ability: 【C】 Your other Character in the Center slot of the Front Row gains 『【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］』.
【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, draw up to 1 card.

name: 冷たいまなざし 詩羽
flavor_text: もしここにウチの生徒がいたら後で困るんじゃない？
ability: 【C】 If you have 1 or less other Characters, this card gets +1500 Power.

name: 反発する二人 詩羽
flavor_text: そんなの、別にあなたに話すことじゃないし
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your 《ゲーム》 or 《小説》 Characters ×500.

name: 困惑と寂寥 詩羽
flavor_text: どうして今なのよ、倫也君
ability: 【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 《ゲーム》 or 《小説》 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this Cost. If you did, place this card in its previous slot in REST)

name: シナリオ担当 詩羽
flavor_text: 睡眠と読書と執筆だけで生きていきたいわね。他にもしたいことあるけど全部寝ながらできるし。
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +X Power. X is equals to the number of your 《ゲーム》 or 《小説》 Characters ×1000.

name: 待ちぼうけ
flavor_text: 詩羽「来ないわね……」英梨々「うん……」
ability: Choose up to 2 Characters from your Waiting Room, return them to Hand, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.

name: 女子高生ラノベ作家 霞詩子
flavor_text: 倫也「豊ヶ崎学園始まって以来の秀才、霞ヶ丘詩羽……」
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Gate：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)
